breakthroughPP.gui

Class InfoPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • breakthroughPP.gui.InfoPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Showable, Setting, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class InfoPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements Setting, Showable
    This class provides a JPanel which prints information to the user. The information depicted consists of the numer of remaining tokens in the game for the red and blue player as well as a messageArea. The least inlcudes information whether a player has won or whos turn the current one is according to the status of the game. Georg-August University Goettingen APP breakthroughPP SoSe 2016
    Author:
    Jan-Philipp Burchert
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
